dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.wf.work.WorkRole
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that defines a Work task in terms of a set of roles which are then used to characterize the functionality of the Work. For example, a particular work of fiber rollout at a location at a certain date can play the role of a build task of an infrastructure project or the role of an installation task in a service fulfillment project.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: WorkRole

child.name: workRole
child.description:
Name of the role that this work plays

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: workRole

child.name: work
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association RolesDescribeWork

This association end is optional
child.label: work

child.name: workSpecificationRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SpecifiesWorkRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: workSpecificationRole
